item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, October 30, 2024 at 11:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Chain-of-Thought Can Hurt Performance on Tasks Where Thinking Makes Humans Worse (126 points | 34 comments)
2. OpenZFS deduplication is good now and you shouldn't use it (58 points | 22 comments)
3. AI Flame Graphs (146 points | 53 comments)
4. Steam games will need to disclose kernel-level anti-cheat on store pages (335 points | 186 comments)
5. Why anti-cheat software utilize kernel drivers (2020) (15 points | 7 comments)
6. Crafting Painterly Shaders (76 points | discuss)
7. The realities of building an IPv6-only city – APNIC (16 points | 5 comments)
8. Rubocop-obsession: RuboCop extension focused on higher-level concepts (48 points | 17 comments)
9. SimpleQA (87 points | 24 comments)
10. An Italian 'fruit detective' who investigates centuries-old paintings (33 points | 2 comments)
11. Google's TOS doesn't eliminate a user's Fourth Amendment rights, judge rules [pdf] (239 points | 170 comments)
12. Show HN: AI OmniGen – AI Image Generator with Consistent Visuals (71 points | 18 comments)
13. Pushing the frontiers of audio generation (151 points | 61 comments)
14. Google CEO says more than a quarter of the company's new code is created by AI (204 points | 309 comments)
15. Is Patrick Mackenzie's salary negotiation guide relevant in today's market? (30 points | 24 comments)
16. M4 MacBook Pro (631 points | 850 comments)
17. Show HN: LlamaPReview – AI GitHub PR reviewer that learns your codebase (71 points | 26 comments)
18. Infisical (YC W23) is hiring full stack engineers (remote or in SF) ( | hide)
19. Classic 3D videogame shadow techniques (298 points | 62 comments)
20. DeepSeek v2.5 – open-source LLM comparable to GPT-4, but 95% less expensive (92 points | 20 comments)
21. Ask HN: Local RAG with private knowledge base (18 points | 2 comments)
22. Launch HN: FlyCode (YC S22) – Stop losing revenue due to failed payments (64 points | 53 comments)
23. SaaS that analyses and monitors your tests (similar tool used daily at Meta) (3 points | 1 comment)
24. Representing web applications as knowledge graphs (55 points | 6 comments)
25. Show HN: Routing24 – Free route optimization in the browser (24 points | 12 comments)
26. Australia/Lord_Howe is the weirdest timezone (917 points | 381 comments)
27. First H5N1 Detections in Swine (10 points | 1 comment)
28. Fruits (2020) (122 points | 22 comments)
29. NASA reconnected with Voyager 1 after a brief pause (197 points | 123 comments)
30. CFPB finalizes personal financial data rights rule (117 points | 47 comments)
